headline: Teradyne forecasts quarterly revenue above estimates, names new CFO
summary: Teradyne on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations, banking on robust demand for its chip-testing equipment, and named a new chief financial officer. Shares of the company surged more than 21% in extended trading, after it also surpassed estimates for third-quarter revenue. Teradyne said Michelle Turner, former CFO at defense contractor L3Harris Technologies, has been appointed as its finance chief effective November 3.

headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Stability
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) has recently made headlines after its stock price shifted slightly over the past week. This stability follows a month in which the stock experienced a mild decline, sparking interest in how investors perceive its current valuation. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. Even with a modest recent dip, L3Harris Technologies’ share price is still up more than 40% year-to-date and its total shareholder return over the past 12 months sits near 20%. This...
